entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, returning to Hogwarts for another year.

entities.name: platform nine and three quarters
entities.description: A platform at King's Cross Station where students board the Hogwarts Express. It is hidden from the non-magical world by a magical archway.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The train that takes students from King's Cross Station to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Harry's mother figure, who is anxious about the others making it in time for the train.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: A boy with dreadlocks who greets Harry and his dog Sirius on the platform.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's dog, who is excited to be going back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: alastor (moody)
entities.description: A wizard with a prosthetic eye and a gruff demeanor, who is tasked with bringing the luggage onto the train.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A Metamorphmagus who is helping Mrs. Weasley and Alastor Moody on the platform.

relationships.description: Harry arrived at Platform Nine and Three Quarters, where he boarded the Hogwarts Express.
Harry boarded the Hogwarts Express on Platform Nine and Three Quarters.
Mrs. Weasley is accompanying Alastor Moody, who is bringing the luggage onto the train.
Lee greeted Harry on the platform, calling out to him and his dog Sirius.
